title: Realizing Multiliteracy Development and Language Education in the AI Era: Integrated Approach to Text, Visual, and Digital Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency, secondary-level language comprehension (grammar, vocabulary, reading), experience with fundamental text analysis, exposure to diverse media types (text/image/video)
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environments, including learners with limited AI technology experience. Focuses on improving reading comprehension and expressive abilities, reflecting cultural contexts for diverse language backgrounds. Enhances digital literacy through integrated language activities from text-based analysis to visual expression.

learning_goals: Learners collaborate with 1 partner to produce 1 educational content piece incorporating 3 multimodal literacy practices (deep text analysis, visual expression design, digital communication strategies) using generative AI tools (ChatGPT, Canva AI, etc.) and systematically explain it via a 10-minute presentation.
Learners evaluate critical reading and digital media literacy competencies by analyzing AIâ€™s societal impacts and strengthen abilities to identify fake information and verify data sources.

Learners propose AI-based language use ethics principles (accuracy, fairness, inclusivity) considering cultural diversity and apply them to practical language activities (writing, translation, presentations).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
